# Introduction

`RNAmodR.Data` contains just example data for the `RNAmodR` and related 
packages. The data is provided as gff3, fasta and bam files.

The following files are included

```{r, echo=FALSE}
l <- list.files(path = "../inst/extdata", pattern = NULL, all.files = FALSE,
                full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE,
                ignore.case = FALSE, include.dirs = FALSE, no.. = FALSE)
as.list(l)
```
